thread.title: K7 - I am a real customer
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by K7 - I am a real customer

author: K7 - I am a real customer
title: K7 - I am a real customer
text: Fast - Easy - Great Value. Loved it. Exactly what they said, no bait and switch discounts. I hate website that tease you with discounts and values only to find you have to make more purchases and increase your overall purchase cost. I just bought one item. Done! Thank you very much.
